Berhane Adere Debala (Ge'ez: ብርሀኔ Winston a mụrụ na 21 Julaị, na afọ 1973 na Shewa) bụ onye Etiopia na-agba ọsọ ogologo oge nke na-ahụ maka 10,000 mita na ọkara marathon
Ọ bụ onye mmeri ụwa n'elu 10,000 m na afọ 2003 na onye mmeri Ụwa na ọkara marathon na afo 2002
Berhane na-arụ ọrụ maka UNICEF dị ka onye nnọchi anya obiọma maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị.
Berhane nwere ihe ndekọ Afrịka maka mita 10,000 n'ime oge nke 30:04.18, setịpụrụ na afọ 2003 World Championships, ebe ọ meriri ọla edo
Tirunesh Dibaba, onye ghọrọ onye Afrịka mbụ gbara ọsọ n'okpuru nkeji iri atọ, mebiri ihe ndekọ Afrịka na afọ 2008 Olympics.
Berhane meriri IAAF World Half Marathon Championships na afọ 2002, na ọla nchara na 2001 World Half Maraton Championships
Ọ bụ onye nwetara ihe nrite ọla edo karịa mita 3000 na 2003 IAAF World Indoor Championships
O meriri na 2006 Chicago Marathon na oge kachasị mma nke 2:20:42
O meriri Chicago Marathon ọzọ na 2007 na Dubai Marathon na 18 Jenụwarị, na afọ 2008. Berhane merikwara na afọ 2007 Ras Al Khaimah Half Marathon.

Ọ bụ nwanyị kachasị elu na 2010 Rock 印度 Roll Mardi Gras Marathon, ebe o dekọrọ ọkara marathon kachasị ọsọ n'ala America na oge 1:07:52, na-emebi ihe kachasị mma ya n'oge gara aga karịa 25 sekọnd.  Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ na isii, nke ahụ kwesịkwara ịbụ ihe ndekọ ụwa nke Masters.  Ọ hụrụ ihe ịma aka site n'aka Ana Dulce Félix iji merie na Great North Run na Septemba, mezue ọkara marathon na 1:08:49. N'afọ 2012, o nwere agbụrụ abụọ, ma n'ọnwa Ọktoba na Britain, ebe ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na Great Birmingham Run na nke atọ na Great South Run.
